text: Josua'a ana zanku antahintahi hakare nehuno, kukena'a tagato nehuno, Ra Anumzamofo huhagerafi huvempage vogisimofo avuga avugosaregati umseno mani'negeno kinaga se'ne. Hagi miko Israeli kva vahe'mo'za Josua'ma hiaza nehu'za zamagra zamanunte kugusopa eri'za nefre'za, Josua'ene zmasunku nehu'za mani'nageno vuno kinga se'ne.
